content.query:
use logical_DWH_nyc_taxi ;

if OBJECT_ID('bronze.trip_type') is not NULL
    drop EXTERNAL table bronze.trip_type go

create EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_type 
    (
        trip_type       TINYINT,
        trip_type_desc  VARCHAR(50)
        )
        with(
            location = 'raw/trip_type.tsv',
            data_source = logical_DWH_exDS,
            file_format =Tsv_file_pv1
            );

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM bronze.trip_type go
